summary:
This mod addes interesting Skyrim\'s combat style.(but partly incomplete)
This mod require SKSE 1.06.03 or higher!!!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]I reuploaded this mod again. Please download it if you couldn\'t download this mod before.[/b][/size]

[b][size=2]I don\'t know english well.
If you have problems, please discuss with other nexus members. I\'m sorry.....[/size][/b]

[b][font=yellow][size=7]SSS for Skyrim Alpha 12_12_07 FIX Version[/size][size=3](Smokin\' Sick Style for Skyrim)[/size][/font][/b]
[b][size=5]by elisees (Not writer\'s mod)[/b][/size]

[youtube]dkpepfz-ljM[/youtube]

[b][font=yellow][size=12]<Description>[/size][/font][/b]

[b][font=yellow][size=10]1. Introudce[/size][/font][/b]

This mod adds interesting Skyrim\'s combat style.

If you need more information, please read \'Readme.txt\', \'Skill List.txt\' and \'INI Setting Help.txt\'

If you need to reset \'SSS.ini\' in Skyrim, write console command \'BAT \"SSS.ini\"\'

[b][font=yellow]This mod can be uploaded to other sites freely, but you shouldn\'t modify this mod absolutely.(Author\'s requirement)

This mod\'s author(not me) said that this mod is partly incomplete and he may not make this mod any more.[/b][/font]

[b][font=yellow][size=10]2. Installation[/size][/font][/b]

[b][font=yellow][size=20][u] this mod require SKSE 1.06.03 or higher, and you must start Skyrim by \'skse_loader.exe\'!!![/b][/font][/size][/u]

[b]?Manual Install[/b]

?-1. Extract 7z file and copy All data files to Skyrim Data Folder
(generally C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data[64bit] or C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data[32bit])

?-2. Check the mod in \'SkyrimLaucher-Data Files\'

?-3. Enjoy the mod!!!!!

[b]?NMM Install[/b]

?-1. Click \'Download with manger\' or \'Download Manually\'.

?-2. If you click \'download with manger\', check this mod in \'mods\' tap. If you click \'download manually\', install this mod and check this mod in \'mods\' tap.

?-3. Enjoy the mod!!!!!

[b]? MO Install[/b]

?-1. Click \'Download with manger\' or \'Download Manually\'.

?-2. Install this mod, check this mod in left mods list and subsequently check it in right mods list. 
(if you have \'Install Mods\' window during installation, please click \'Data\' folder from the right botton and click \'Set data directory\')

?-3. Enjoy the mod!!!!!
author: Elysees
